item.title: Manifesto on “Algorithmic Sabotage”
item.description: Manifesto on “Algorithmic Sabotage” A preliminary version of 10 statements, numbered 0 to 9, on the principles, strategies and aesthetics of “algorithmic sabotage”. Posted: Jun 13, 2024. Modified: Aug 23, 2024 Graphic: © Algorithmic Sabotage Research Group | The typeface used is Avara from Velvetyne Foundry: https://velvetyne.fr/fonts/avara/ Context # “To create? No, to destroy, destroy and destroy again, whatever the strength left in these muscles allows. Because destruction is the power that is left.
